mapper.select: SELECT A.ALARM_NO, A.SENDER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.PROFILE_IMG, ALARM_TYPE,READ_YN, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE) * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE < 30 THEN FLOOR(SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE) || '일 전' WHEN SYSDATE - A.ALARM_CREATE < 365 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE-A.ALARM_CREATE)/30) || '달 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(A.ALARM_CREATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ALARM_CREATE, (SELECT BOARD_TYPE_NAME FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO = A.BOARD_TYPE_NO) BOARD_TYPE_NAME, CASE WHEN A.BOARD_TYPE_NO = 2 THEN (SELECT A_TITLE FROM ALBUM WHERE ALBUM_NO = A.BOARD_NO) WHEN A.BOARD_TYPE_NO = 3 THEN (SELECT V_TITLE FROM VIDEO WHERE VIDEO_NO = A.BOARD_NO) END BOARD_TITLE FROM ALARM A JOIN MEMBER M ON(SENDER_NO = MEMBER_NO) WHERE RECEIVER_NO = #{loginMemberNo} ORDER BY ALARM_NO DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ALARM WHERE ALARM_NO IN (${alarmNoList})
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET READ_YN = 'Y' WHERE ALARM_NO IN (${alarmNoList}) AND READ_YN = 'N'
